enumDescriptions.ISO: The SoftwareInventory item is formatted with the read-only ISO 9660 (also known as ECMA-119) filesystem commonly used for CDs and DVDs.
enumDescriptions.Raw: This is an unstructured file format.
enumDescriptions.Unknown: This indicates an unknown file format.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Architecture.description: The processor architecture supported by this SoftwareInventory item.
Architecture.longDescription: This property shall contain the string which identifies the processor architecture supported by this SoftwareInventory item.

Distribution.description: The common name of the operating system distribution.
Distribution.longDescription: This property shall contain a string which identifies the operating system distribution of the SoftwareInventory item.

Format.description: The format of the SoftwareInventory file.
Format.longDescription: An enumeration that indicates the format of the SoftwareInventory file.

InstructionSet.description: The processor instruction set supported by this SoftwareInventory item.
InstructionSet.longDescription: This property shall contain the string which identifies the processor instruction set supported by this SoftwareInventory item.

SizeBytes.description: Size of the software inventory file in Byte.
SizeBytes.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the size of the software inventory file in Byte.

State.description: The current state of the SoftwareInventory item.
State.longDescription: An enumeration that indicates the current state of the SoftwareInventory item.

Type.description: The processor type supported by this SoftwareInventory item.
Type.longDescription: This property shall contain the string which identifies the processor type supported by this SoftwareInventory item.

enumDescriptions.Active: Denotes an software inventory item that is fully available.
enumDescriptions.Deactivated: Denotes that access to software inventory file is not allowed to any non-admin user.
enumDescriptions.Uploading: The software inventory file is currently uploading.

title: #EID_47597_RECSBox_SoftwareInventory.v1_0_0
